title: Dakcrypto
author: Dakcrypto
content: Looking at the current situation and corruption issues in Nigeria ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡¬ who do you think will become the Number 1 citizen of Nigeria in the tomorrow election, even with the monetary policy of Nigeria buying of votes is not still stopped, I saw a news saying a PDP politician was cought with over $500,000 US dollar for buying of votes. This 3 candidates are super strong and "Na wahala be dis oo" PETER OBI ATIKU TINUBU  WHO GO WIN ?

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: The situation of Nigeria is too bad that what it needs now is someone who has a strategic plan to tackle corruption, fuel scarcity and the general economic crisis of this country from a consumer nation to a production nation, and we all know that among the three listed candidates, "Peter Obi" is the most qualifier to handle all this, simply because he is vibrant, mentally stable, good in finance and economic management compared to the other two @ "Bola Tinubu" who's only reason he said "it's my turn to rule" and "Atiku Abubakar" who once embezzled public fund and privatized many sectors while he was still the Vice President.So by Gods grace, I will be very glad seeing "Peter Obi"  as president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: It will be very interesting to see if there is anyone here who would choose any candidate aside from Peter Obi. It gives me hope that for the first time Nigeria wants a president who can perform, this is the first time since I was born that I have seen the barrier of tribe and stigmatization having no say in the peopleâ€™s choice. Growing up, I was made to believe we will never have a president from the East, that if we do they will divide the country. Now it seems the man from the East is the only candidate that wants to keep the country united and free from terrorism.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I will not be surprised to see the people turning up for Obi but my fear is that all those people shouting obedient in social media and otherwise should be realistic not the pocket supporters that would deviate at the last minute when they see money. Obi supporters should keep their social media handle very active now by posting and sharing their party logo and thumb print space so people would know now is the time, let the heat begin now, let the internet buzz for obi.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on February 24, 2023, 10:20:42 PMI will not be surprised to see the people turning up for Obi but my fear is that all those people shouting obedient in social media and otherwise should be realistic not the pocket supporters that would deviate at the last minute when they see money. Obi supporters should keep their social media handle very active now by posting and sharing their party logo and thumb print space so people would know now is the time, let the heat begin now, let the internet buzz for obi.Deviate ke? Collect the money if you want to, it's your money and vote your conscience.I'm rooting for PO. He's young, energetic, and a visionary leader. His track records speaks volume for himself and he has what it takes to steer the ship called Nigeria. I hope he wins today's presidential election because is the best qualified candidate and the people's choice.

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: Indeed, the buying of votes will not stop anytime soon on Nigeria. But this 2023 election will be so different in the sense that our eyes don see shege. The youth have seen that buying of vote is one of the reaaon we suffer in this country because they kept voting the wrong leader in. Among the 3 candidates, Atiku, Tinubu and Peter Obi, the only person that is competent enough to rule this Nigeria is PETER OBI. He is so competent, young, Educated. I will vote for him with all my heart. Peter Obi is the man.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Quote from: DakcryptoLooking at the current situation and corruption issues in Nigeria ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡¬ who do you think will become the Number 1 citizen of Nigeria in the tomorrow election, even with the monetary policy of Nigeria buying of votes is not still stopped, I saw a news saying a PDP politician was cought with over $500,000 US dollar for buying of votes. This 3 candidates are super strong and "Na wahala be dis oo" PETER OBI ATIKU TINUBU  WHO GO WIN ? Based on their campaign rally all d aspirat carry out few weeks ago made people to no who is good to lead ur nation as president and people are not choosing base on party or region, and the most qualified candidate in dis 2023 general election is Peter Obi the labour party candidate. His track record as a formal governor show that he is not a corrupt person and his speech made me to prefer him among other candidates in dis election .

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: All these vote for this person vote for this person no follow at all, no be as time don reach piple with PVC no go gree come out na to dy on social media dy vote with thumbs for phone. Well to me my best candidate nah who go fit do the right thing and to make this our beloved contri development and move forward... I no go fit go express my self today bcos of some kasala wey hold me down for long now but we thank God and make the right person win today election.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Dakcrypto on February 24, 2023, 07:03:05 PM WHO GO WIN ? Who wins depends on who the masses vote for.Â Based on the campaign and his overall voice, Peter Obi is likely to be a winner, but only ifÂ 1. All Peter Obi supporters come out and vote just as they are preaching, and note that they do not vote with their mouths but with their PVCs.Â 2. The election is conducted free and fair.Â If these two are sure, I believe we will have Mr. Peter Obi as our winner.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: My preferred candidate na peter obi of the labour party, and na peter obi go win, but my fear na this INEC officials because Dem go always dey manipulate results. Right from yesterday till now we Don dey see pulling units online wey peter obi don win, but my problem be say na why inec never still dey announce results already, na wetin Dem dey wait for, now thesame Lagos State wey Dem say peter obi don win, now I dey see online say na tinubu win for Lagos State,Â  inec don dey rig the election....

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Dakcrypto on February 24, 2023, 07:03:05 PMLooking at the current situation and corruption issues in Nigeria ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡¬ who do you think will become the Number 1 citizen of Nigeria in the tomorrow election, even with the monetary policy of Nigeria buying of votes is not still stopped, I saw a news saying a PDP politician was cought with over $500,000 US dollar for buying of votes. This 3 candidates are super strong and "Na wahala be dis oo" PETER OBI ATIKU TINUBU  WHO GO WIN ? The truth be say na Nigeria we dey and you suppose know say no be who we think say go win but na who them want make him win go win.I been dey think say obi supporters na just online dem dey but to my greatest surprise him supporters come out and I was really impressed because most of the results I heard yesterday (though not authentic) we're all in favour of obi and I was happy if for nothing but for the fact that the people were wise enough to vote for their preferred candidate.On my own I go like make Atiku win for the sake of my local governmentÂ  because I know say any how him bad, eleme no go too cry because he also get major shares for intels and the proposed cargo airport go come to place ASAP.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Dakcrypto on February 24, 2023, 07:03:05 PMThis 3 candidates are super strong and "Na wahala be dis oo" PETER OBI ATIKU TINUBU I haven't picked one particular candidate and that was done intentionally not to influence anyone as I noticed Nigerian can be easier influence when it come to election matters. Personally I no dey vote any of them. They're all corrupt and once were part of the system or currently part of the system that has kept Nigeria in this way. Neither of them is a youth and if IÂ  remember correctly what we were fighting for was a youth president but now we're settling for a 61 years just because he's the better option among the three?Oh finally we letting the system detect who we're to vote instead of us making the choice. OBI lost my vote when he went to labor party. The election would had been more fun if he created a totally new party that the youth will be the flag barriers for other political positions and then we elect him the president and after him any other presidential candidate will be a youth but no we might be getting the same fate that happened when APC was form from same greedy politicians. Aren't they the same people in labor party? You think they're different, OBi might be a scent but what about the whole party itself. Sha this is just my opinion and it doesn't really matter since election has been conducted and we waiting on results.
